infos.value: Well, would you look at that. He wasn't just blowing smoke.
It's huge, too. What on earth did he put in here...?
What rubbish. Does he expect me to kill Oelde dressed like a gaudy prince?
Do you really harbor such hatred for Oelde, Lord Sterne?
Harbor it? It flows freely through me. I'll see him dead.
There is no hint of falsehood in your words?
Very well. This armor is imbued with magic that amplifies the wearer's hatred, turning it into power.
If your hatred is true, then I expect you will become quite powerful, Lord Sterne.
You're saying that I must wear this armor to fight Oelde?
Lord Sadali has prepared this armor for that very purpose.
So another ancient relic comes out to play...
